page.title: 02Speed Limit
page.content: During recent years there have been a number of traffic accidents involving the people of Springholm. In the past four years there have been sixteen accidents involving vehicles. There have been some very lucky escapes,some very serious accidents and two deaths. Most of these accidents involved adults, not children as you would expect. The latest accident was on the 1st of June,1985 involving two cars, one pulling onto the road,the other hitting it. Luckily enough it was not serious. The speed limit of Springholm is 40 mph but motorists do not stick to it. Instead of doing 40 mph they do 50 mph. The people of Springholm and other areas round about think that if the speed limit was reduced to 30 mph motorists might do 40 mph.
